Join Toastmasters, get inspired by Scott Young's blog post, and learn the best tips from the science of people.
Books
TED Talks: The Official TED Guide to Public Speaking
TED Talks: The Official TED Guide to Public Speaking
TED Talks: The Official TED Guide to Public Speaking Now in paperback Since taking over TED in the early 2000s, Chris Anderson has shown how carefully crafted short talks can be the key to unlocking empathy, stirring excitement, spreading knowledge, and promoting a shared dream.
https://www.ted.com/read/ted-talks-the-official-ted-guide-to-public-speaking
Summary
TED Talks: The Official TED Guide to Public Speaking - You Exec
The best way to make an impression in today's world is to stand up and say something. The written word is important, but the spoken word is infinitely more powerful. For today's leaders and advocates public speaking is a core skill, a way to inspire, explain, inform, or persuade-whether in business, in education, or on a public stage.
https://youexec.com/book-summaries/ted-talks-the-official-ted-guide-to-public-speaking
Ted Talk
Chris Anderson: TED's secret to great public speaking
There's no single formula for a great talk, but there is a secret ingredient that all the best ones have in common. TED curator Chris Anderson shares this secret -- along with four ways to make it work for you. Do you have what it takes to share an idea worth spreading?
https://www.ted.com/talks/chris_anderson_ted_s_secret_to_great_public_speaking
The Art of Public Speaking by Dale Carnegie
Timeless wisdom that has shaped the foundations of excellence in Public Speaking
The Art of Public Speaking by Dale Carnegie and J. Berg Esenwein
Free kindle book and epub digitized and proofread by Project Gutenberg.
http://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/16317
Summary
The Art of Public Speaking Summary, Review PDF
Has The Art of Public Speaking by Dale Carnegie, with J.B. Esenwein been sitting on your reading list? Pick up the key ideas in the book with this quick summary. Spiders, heights, public speaking. Everyone has their own phobias.
https://lifeclub.org/books/the-art-of-public-speaking-dale-carnegie-with-j-b-esenwein-review-summary
Trustworthy Experts
Toastmasters international
Time tested ways to improve your public speaking.
Toastmasters International -Public Speaking Tips
Skip to main content Whether you're new to giving speeches or are a seasoned Toastmaster, these how-to articles will help you hone your skills. Get quick and easy tips for how to prepare and present an award, use visual aids and props, incorporate body language into your presentations, and more.
https://www.toastmasters.org/resources/public-speaking-tips
Joining your local toastmasters and attending weekly is a sure fire way to get better at Public Speaking.
Toastmasters International -Find a Club
Where Leaders Are Made
https://www.toastmasters.org/find-a-club
Testimonial from Scott Young's Ultralearning to get a taste of what you learn at toastmasters
Conquering Public Speaking: From Zero Experience to World Championships in Seven Months | Scott H Young
When I started working on my upcoming book, Ultralearning, I wanted to document people who took on intense and ambitious learning projects, like the MIT Challenge or Year Without English. I found many examples, but a little voice always nagged in my head-maybe these people were just naturally good at learning!
https://www.scotthyoung.com/blog/2019/07/29/conquering-public-speaking-from-zero-experience-to-world-championships-in-seven-months/
Podcast
Toastmasters International -Podcasts
Skip to main content Why Emotional Intelligence Matters - Harvey Deutschendorf It's been said that Emotional Intelligence (EI) a.k.a EQ can sometimes be more important than IQ. In this episode, Greg and Ryan speak with EI expert, speaker and author Harvey Deutschendorf.
http://www.toastmasters.org/resources/news-and-announcements/podcasts
Armani Talks
Distills information gathered from his toastmasters experience and more into easy to digest actionable advice

BLOG - Armani Talks
The ArmaniTalks Blog helps you improve your communication skills. You will learn the art of public speaking, social skills & digitial content creation.

The Science of People
the Science of People not only include illustrative examples for many public speaking, but also actionable steps for any of your public speaking queries like '15 Science Based Public Speaking Tips' and 'Stage Fright: How to Overcome It in 7 Easy Steps'
You searched for public speaking | Science of People
https://www.scienceofpeople.com/?s=public%20speaking&is_v=1
How To Be A Public Speaker â€” Or, The Art Of The Keynote Address by Ryan Holiday
How To Be A Public Speaker - Or, The Art Of The Keynote Address
There's a Mitch Hedberg joke about how Hollywood tries to turn every comedian into an actor. He said that's like going up to a chef and saying: Yeah, but can you farm? Marketing and business and writing (and a lot of other fields) are the same way for some reason.
https://thoughtcatalog.com/ryan-holiday/2015/01/how-to-be-a-public-speaker-or-the-art-of-the-keynote-address/
Public Speaking tips from Susain Cain
A guide from the queen of introverts
10 Public Speaking Tips From Susan Cain
When my book first came out, I did what I called a Year of Speaking Dangerously. Below are ten public speaking tips I learned along the way: 1. For many speakers-and especially for introverts-preparation is key. Take your time crafting the speech so that it flows logically and is illustrated with stories and examples.
https://www.quietrev.com/10-public-speaking-tips-from-my-year-speaking-dangerously/
Public Speaking Archives - Quiet Revolution
In the past year and a half, I've given over 100 keynote speeches and hundreds of presentations, and things have changed dramatically. I still get nervous occasionally, but public speaking is now one of my favorite activities.
https://www.quietrev.com/tag/public-speaking/
How Tim Ferriss Prepares for his Speeches
Public Speaking - How I Prepare Every Time
(Photo: Tim Wagner) In the past several weeks, I've been asked quite a lot about public speaking. While downing gin tonics over Brazilian BBQ at the SXSW Interactive tech conference, I was approached by the CMO (Chief Marketing Officer) of a start-up I advise. She pulled me aside to ask primarily two questions: 1.
https://tim.blog/2010/04/11/public-speaking-how-i-prepare-every-time/
Public Speaking at Scientific Conferences
A Comprehensive Guide for Public Speaking at Scientific Conferences
Introduction I served as a judge for some of the student presentations at the 2016 Canadian Statistics Student Conference (CSSC). The conference was both a learning opportunity and a networking opportunity for statistics students in Canada. The presentations allowed the students to share their research and course projects with their peers, and it was a...
https://chemicalstatistician.wordpress.com/2017/05/16/a-comprehensive-guide-for-public-speaking-at-scientific-conferences/
Tips from Simon Sinek
7 Public Speaking Secrets From TED Legend Simon Sinek
You'd never know it, but Simon Sinek is naturally shy and doesn't like speaking to crowds. At parties, he says he hides alone in the corner or doesn't even show up in the first place. He prefers the latter.
https://www.businessinsider.com/simon-sinek-shares-public-speaking-secrets-2016-1?IR=T
Podcasts
With a Negotiation Expert
Alex Kouts | The Art of Public Speaking (Episode 393)
If you're serious about advancing your career and yourself, you have to be serious about your communication and speaking skills. Here, Alex Kouts (@akouts) gives us the edge we need to communicate well. "The best ideas not communicated do not exist." -Alex Kouts What is the Rule of Threes and how does it apply to communication?
https://theartofcharm.com/podcast-episodes/alex-kouts-the-art-of-public-speaking-episode-393/
Susan Cain & Tim Ferriss Discussion including Public Speaking advice.
The Tim Ferriss Show Transcripts: Susan Cain (#357)
Please enjoy this transcript of my interview with Susan Cain (@susancain), Chief Revolutionary of Quiet Revolution and author of the bestsellers Quiet Power: The Secret Strengths of Introverts and Quiet: The Power of Introverts in A World That Can't Stop Talking. Her writing has appeared in the The New York Times, The Atlantic, The Wall Street Journal, and...
https://tim.blog/2019/01/28/the-tim-ferriss-show-transcripts-susan-cain/
Videos
Great for College Presentations
Become a Better Speaker: 9 Essential Public Speaking Tips - College Info Geek
Speeches and presentations can seem like the scariest things in the world (except hippos - those things are scary as all get out). With practice, though, you can reduce the anxiety they cause, calm your nerves, and become a great public speaker.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zZBJZ-dBVbE
Breaking down the international toastmaster champions speech
6 Public Speaking Tips To Hook Any Audience
6 Public Speaking Tips To Hook Any Audience Public speaking is hard. We all know it. But if you master a few basic public speaking tips and techniques, you can absolutely hook any audience. https://goo.gl/IpBEnO In this video you'll get the public speaking training to hook an audience n 30 seconds.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k8GvTgWtR7o
From Simon Sinek, who has an 11M views+ Ted Talk
Simon Sinek: Storytelling Tips & Public Speaking Advice
Simon Sinek, one of the top public speakers in the world offers storytelling tips as well as public speaking advice. With Simon Sinek's storytelling tips, you will be able to tell stories in a meaningful way next time you have to give a presentation or do any sort of public speaking.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6GlpqIFbEqw
Advice I've taken
Join Toastmasters - No matter how much advice I receive, I am never able to implement it unless I practice it. Toastmasters is a way to do this, you even get tailored feedback every time you present!
Storytelling > facts - No one remembers that stat you put in your presentation, but they will remember your stories
Your First Impression Is Key - I aim to appear confident and collected as soon as the audience can see me, even before I start speaking.
